description: Bray Zenn is a Fossil Researcher who digs up and restores Fossil Pok√©mon in the Galar region`s Wild Area. He works alongside fellow Fossil Researcher Cara Liss who is always calling his work methods brazen, for which his English dub name is based off of. He restored a Dracovish using a Fossil Restorer Machine and after getting lots of new data studying it, he allowed Ash Ketchum to catch it.
name: Gasattsu
